name: Egyptian Dreams 4 Slots Deluxe
description:
Enjoy the fun of ancient Egypt in Egyptian Dreams 4 Slots Deluxe for iPad!

3, 4 or 5 scattered pyramids during normal play will start the Pharaoh Feature - where you get to pick your free games, multiplier AND up to FIVE wildcards!

The cash pyramid jackpot is triggered whenever 3 Eyes of Ra appear on screen. Win your way up the Cash Pyramid to win the jackpot!

The Cleopatra Feature plays automatically at the end of the Pharaoh Feature - at least 5 free games. During the Cleopatra spins a special 3 high Queen of Egypt will appear on all reels. The Queen substitutes for all symbols except scattered pyramids.


At the end of the free games the Cleopatra Bonus round begins. Cleopatra will reveal 9 falcons - you must choose one to reveal a very special bonus!

This game is for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost.

The odds of winning in this simulation are not the same as in real slot machines. Real slot machines are designed to make you consistently lose.

You must be aged 18 (or 21 in some areas) to gamble.

Pokie Magic supports responsible gambling and appropriate parental supervision.
